cleaned_text: Barcelona, 13-15 September 2019 PROGRAM #Ecim19https:/ /ecim2019-barcelona.sesmi.es/enTOGETHER IN INTEGRATIVE the program of the Barcelona European Integrative Medicine Congress 2019. This is the XII European Congress of the European Society of Integrative Medicine (ESIM) and the II National Congress of the Sociedad Española de Salud y Medicina Integrativa (SESMI ). We have the collaboration of the British Medical Acupuncture Society, the Japanese Society of Integrative Medicine and the Portuguese Integrative Medicine Society. We have the support of the Asamblea Nacional de Homeopatia from Spain and the Federación Española de Sanitarios por la Medicina Integrativa , as well. This congress with many health professionals of the different disciplines. On Thursday September 12th and in co-organization with the Faculty of Nursing of the URV of Tarragona and within the framework of this congress we did the First International Symposium on Education and Integrative Health in this city. This Symposium wants to be a forum for the exchange of knowledge and experiences among members of the educational community of different countries, the search for dialogue, to help us find guidelines for an integrative educational framework. For this reason, the IV Plenary Session on Education will be celebrated in Tarragona. On Friday 13th, in our pre-congress in Barcelona and during the morning session, different workshops have been offered in order to provide participants practical teaching. Talking about the congress itself, we will start on Friday 13th in the plenary room at 2 p.m. During the opening of our meeting, and before the plenary lectures, the Heel 2019 prize will be awarded to the best Integrative Medicine article of the previous year. On Saturday we will have 5 more rooms for lectures, two of them for oral communications, ready to receive brilliant national and international speakers who investigate and treat in the fields of Integrative Medicine. There will also be space for the presentation of posters. Some space will be reserved for commercial companies related to Integrative Medicine, whose support we specially thank as it helps make meeting dinner will be held after the work on Saturday with live rumba music. It will sure help us to enjoy all together. On Sunday, at the end of the congress we will have a debate with the title "How can we integrate Integrative Medicine" and, after that , we will present the winners for The Tulip Award Complementary Therapies in Medicine Early Career Research Award 2018 and The ERAIM Award European Journal of Integrative Medicine Early Researcher Award for Integrative Medicine 2018. The prizes for the best Congress Oral Communications and Posters will be awarded in the closing ceremony, as well. Our committees, both the organizer and the scientist, as well as our technical secretariat, have been working intensively to make possible a top quality, scientific and unforgettable Congress for you all. Integrative Medicine is a meeting point between conventional medicine and that which represents and uses complementary and natural techniques, focusing the and preventive practices. Our congress would like to be a space for the study and deepening of Integrative Medicine among the professionals who practice it, both in Europe and around the world, and also a space for debate, a debate that includes users with their needs and demands for the current systems of health. We wish you all enjoy our beautiful and Mediterranean city of Barcelona and a very good, deep, useful and sharing congress. Welcome to (Berlin/DE) Congress Presidents Dra. SESMI 39 VENUEGENERAL INFORMATION 40 GENERAL Catalans, h OURS · Friday 13 September from 11:00 am · Saturday 14 September from 07:30 am · Sunday 15 September from 08:00 am ORal P RESENtati ONS The presentations should be made in PowerPoint format (for Pc not for MAC). Screen format 16:9. The use of personal laptops will not be allowed. Please, save your presentation on a USB stick and bring it to the congress. You must upload your presentation at the PowerPoint delivery point located in the congress venue. Presentations must be uploaded at least one hour before the start of the session. Please, bear in mind that Saturday there will be six simultaneous rooms, so we strongly recommend that you upload it on Friday. PowerPoint delivery point will be opened on Friday at 11.00h. Oral presentations can be in Spanish or English (there will be simultaneous translation to both languages in all the meeting rooms). POStER PRESENtati ONS If your poster is assigned to this date... You must hang it up between Friday 13 September, in the poster exhibition area during the Guided Poster Session. Posters that are not removed will be kept by staff until the end of the conference day, and will be disposed of after that. The maximum poster size is 90cm wide x 120cm high (vertical format). Each poster will have a location on the display panel that can be identified with the corresponding number. The material for putting the poster up will be available in sufficient quantities in the designated place. No personal material for hanging up posters is allowed. Hang your poster up 30 minutes before the session begins and remove it after the session. Do not send it before the congress, you must bring it with you.41 GENERAL INFORMATIONPlease stand next to your poster during the guided poster presentation session you have been assigned to so you can give explanations and participate in discussions during this time. Every author has been allocated 5 min for presenting their poster and 2 min for discussion. Chairmen are asked to observe the presentation time strictly and we will encourage all chairmen to interrupt the presentation when the time is over. Some posters will be presented simultaneously. The poster must contain title, method, results (these should occupy the poster, they can be presented as tables, graphs, figures and photos) and conclusions Updated bibliography. Posters can be in Spanish or English. awa RdS The following prizes will be awarded: First, second and third prizes to the best oral presentation First, second and third prizes to the best poster To qualify for the prize, it is essential that your work is original, and has not been published, or been given an award previously; however, these works can participate in the conference with the aim of disseminating the work. cERtificatE O f attENda NcE You will receive your Certificate of Attendance via email after the conference.Complementos alimenticios producidos bajo control farmacéutico Health, Metabolism & Nutrition 42 SPONSORSSPONSORS Gold MUSIC AND VOICE COLLABORATION EXCELLENCE IN INTEGRATIVE MEDICINE RESEARCH AWARD 933 238 573
